data.title: Six partner countries
data.content: France, Turkey, Greece, Croatia, Spain and Hungary

data.title: Achieve what?
data.content: Create an educational-training kit and establishing a network and a platform that will help with the development of competencies of youth workers in entrepreneurship and employment

data.title: How?
data.content: By creating a European platform providing the users with tools, methodologies and innovative activities to motivate young people in the proccess of seeking employment in the field of cultural heritage.
